salaryExpectations: LKR 60,000 (Chef de Partie) to LKR 600,000+ (Executive Chef) per month.
futureOutlook: With the growth of tourism and a vibrant restaurant scene in Colombo, skilled chefs are in high demand. There is a growing appreciation for specialized cuisines and fine dining experiences. Many successful chefs gain international experience and return to Sri Lanka to open their own highly acclaimed restaurants.
